item.description: Dave & Buster's long-awaited stock price reversal is underway as turnaround efforts gain traction and the outlook improves.

item.description: The landmark $1 billion licensing agreement between Disney and OpenAI aims to establish “meaningful standards for responsible AI in entertainment.”

item.title: Adobe Gets Post-Earnings Lift: Long-Term Outlook Favors Upside
item.description: Down more than 40% from its highs, are markets too bearish on Adobe? The stock's low valuation suggests that this could be the case after earnings.
